title: Updated SimulationCraft string generation for Dragonflight, 10-man speedrun support for Ulduar

changes.change: 10-man Ulduar speedrun routes are now possible. Both the mapping and required enemies have been updated. Creating a new Ulduar route allows you select between 10-man and 25-man versions. All current Ulduar routes are considered 25-man.
Viewing routes for a specific season now has dedicated pages for showing popular routes for just that season - it is no longer based on the expansion of said season.
Reduced the downtime of the site while performing an update.
HP calculation of enemies is now correct past keystone level +10.
Fixed a crash that could sometimes occur when attempting to save a pull.
Map Icons imported from MDT can now always be edited properly.
Map Icons exported to an MDT string now copy over the name of the icon (for example: Bloodlust, Heroism) if no comment was provided.
Added floor coordinates for all currently available dungeons - this means that travel times will now be accurately calculated for SimulationCraft strings.
SimulationCraft string generation is now updated for Dragonflight (Season 1). Also adds support for Thundering affix.
Added support for Dragonflying for Nokhud Offensive to calculate (more) accurate delays between pulls.
Added mountable areas for all Dragonflight S1 dungeons.
